response.overview: Tony (Tony Genius) is a dark-sided predator disguised as a college tutor. Bubbling just under his calm exterior is a horny pervert lurking for a chance to get his hands on his next unsuspecting college girl (Venus Vixen). Venus, looking for much needed help with her calculus studies, contacts Tony and schedules her first tutoring session. Little does she know her lessons are going to involve much more than calculus. When her stepmom (Sarah Jessie) discovers exactly what Venus is learning, the lessons rise to a whole 'nother kinky level.
response.title: The Tutor
